actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to provide that a citizen of the United States shall not lose his citizenship before obtaining citizenship or permanent residence in another country.

summary.text: Provides that a citizen of the United States shall not lose his citizenship before obtaining citizenship or permanent residence in another country.

titles.title: A bill to provide that a citizen of the United States shall not lose his citizenship before obtaining citizenship or permanent residence in another country.
